body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have at least one creature on the battlefield under your control
2. Play Fiend Hunter
3. Try to target one of your own creatures with Fiend Hunter ability "When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature."

What is the expected output?
Fient Hunter should be able to target creatures under its owners control with its ablity, when it comes into play.

What do you see instead?
When the alility is activated, it doesn't allow the player to target one of his own creatures. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.41 on Windows 7
author: [sagk...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/113501647034314670939/)
title: Fiend Hunter unable to target creatures under it's owners control

comments.body:
This is due to the option "Remove unusual target choices". Try disabling that via the menu Arena -> Perferences

**Status:** WontFix
